name: Hall of Frame
description:
Short puzzle game about exploring a magical castle where frames must continue there eternal loops. And so will you...

If you liked it, please rate it on the Ludum Dare page!
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/hall-of-frame

Controls:

Arrow Keys or W,A,S,D for movement

Z or Space for jumping

X or E to use/interact
